title: Share With Blood
original_name: シェア・ウィズ・ブラッド
sinopse:
After losing his mother, Ushio Kunogi has moved to a share house owned by a father who he has never met. This place he now lives is a European-styled mansion that stands mysteriously in the remote mountains, which is home to vampires! Moreover, it was not only the house that’s being shared, but the blood he must give in exchange for their hospitality...

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
